mapper.select: SELECT `a`.`id` AS `id`, `a`.`leader_level_id` AS `leader_level_id`, `a`.`name` AS `name`, `a`.`mobile_no` AS `mobile_no`, `a`.`status` AS `status`, `a`.`sort` AS `sort`, `a`.`deleted` AS `deleted`, `a`.`operator` AS `operator`, `a`.`create_time` AS `create_time`, `a`.`modified_time` AS `modified_time`, `b`.`name` AS `leader_level_name` FROM `dict_petition_leader` `a` LEFT JOIN `dict_petition_leader_level` `b` ON `a`.`leader_level_id` = `b`.`id` WHERE a.deleted=0 ORDER BY a.sort
